summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor with blog/enquiry types and admin checks, plus a React+TS frontend scaffold with TanStack Router, React Query, public layout (header/footer), and an admin guard using Internet Identity. However, stable upgrade persistence and deployment documentation are not evidenced, and some implemented auth/profile/secret-token mechanisms appear beyond the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enquiry submissions and blog posts must persist across canister upgrades using stable storage patterns.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend state shown uses in-memory Maps and vars (e.g., `let blogPosts = Map.empty...`, `var nextPostId = 1`) with no evidence of `stable var` state, preupgrade/postupgrade hooks, or stable serialization patterns in the provided diff excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide deployment/run instructions for an Internet Computer app (local dfx steps + production guidance) and explicitly note deviations from PHP/MySQL+cPanel.
missing_requirements.reason: No documentation files (README/DEPLOYMENT) or instruction text are shown in the diff summary; only code files are evidenced.
evidence: file-diff summary shows only code additions; no README/docs listed

hallucinated_features.description: User profile creation/setup flow for admins/users (ProfileSetupModal + get/save user profile methods).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements focus on blogs, enquiries, and admin access control; it does not request user profile management or a mandatory profile setup modal.

hallucinated_features.description: Secret token-based access control initialization via URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) called on actor creation.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 specifies Internet Identity authentication and admin-only method checks; it does not request a secret-token bootstrap mechanism passed via URL params.
